reviews: If you like your clothes big then I would recommend buying these. I’m 6’7” 295lbs and the 3xl tall was huge! I love it! It will probably shrink in the dryer but I hang dry my clothes so they don’t shrink. Great quality stuff as to be expected from carhartt.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Tall Pocket Long-Sleeve Workwear T-Shirt K126

review_title: Great quality, well worth the price
reviews: I was glad to have read other reviews of this shirt and not ordered a tall size. I’m 6’1” and usually order talls when available. These are well made long sleeve t-shirts, that wash and wear well. Perfect for a long cold winter. I’ve purchased 4 of them and will likely purchase one more to wear until summer returns.
product_name: Carhartt Men's Tall Pocket Long-Sleeve Workwear T-Shirt K126
